prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, blue body and playful demeanor.
I want an adorable Pokemon that resembles a seal, with a soft, rounded shape.
Generate an aquatic creature with a shiny, icy appearance and a friendly personality.
Make a small, cute Pokemon that can swim gracefully through the ocean.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its flippers to glide through water effortlessly.
Design a playful, blue Pokemon that loves to frolic in icy waters.
Give me a charming, aquatic Pokemon with a round face and happy expression.
